overview: Greg Timbol has over 20 years of experience in business development and sales within the high technology industry including the life sciences, materials engineering and robotics sectors. Before joining Harvest, he held senior-level positions at Materials Design Inc., Pharsight (acquired by Certara) and Biosym Technologies (now Accelrys). He has a strong track record in driving growth opportunities through new account expansion, major account management and strategic partner development. Greg received his B.Sc. from the University of British Columbia.
